reviewText: This wonderful three part series is AMAZING find to own for any Buster Keaton fan.  It's one of the best Biography on the star himself in his films to have and owned as a nice collection.  It's an hard to find video's.  Wish it became available on USA Region 1 DVD in the near future. A must to have for any Fan out there.
This is one of a great three part series shown on British and later american public television.  Lots of unique rarely seen photos. Recommended.
If you love Keaton you will love this documentary. It is just a must have for any Keaton Fan.
